fields.description:
As described on ticket: TIU-17828-443 ( http://support.appcelerator.com/tickets/TIU-17828-443/homepage ) The Audio Player for android works on SDK 2.2 but not on SDK 2.1

Sample Code: http://pastie.org/private/au5whnxxvdhqzlqnn31mvq

Tested on Android Emulator APIs 2.2 and 2.1
Ti SDK 1.6.3 (Apr 18 2011 16:23 rb8672b44)

comments.body: same issue please someone help us its possible to stream aacp in titanium?
Resolving this as this issue is not reproducible with TISDK 3.2. You can download the latest copy of the TISDK and test your app.

Verified fix with the provided code in the comments with following environment:

Appc Studio: 3.2.3.201404162038
SDK build: 3.2.3.v20140417162517, 3.3.0.v20140417173316 and 3.2.0 GA
acs: 1.0.14
npm: 1.3.2
alloy:1.3.1
CLI: titanium@3.2.3-beta
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1-beta1
Xcode: 5.1.1
Osx: Mavericks(10.9.2)
Device: Nexus 7 (4.3) and Nexus 5 (4.4.2)

Audio is playing fine. Hence closing the issue.
